name: Zap
description:
In Zap, the player must shoot all of the green targets that appear and score as much points as possible before dying.

Ways to die in Zap:

-Touching the edge of the map

-Touching or shooting enemies

-Not shooting a target before it explodes

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim crosshair

Mouse left click - Shoot (one bullet at a time)

R - Reset

Welp, I guess this is my first game. There's much more that I want to add but I thought releasing this early version would be fine too. I can't promise when I'll update Zap or what I'll be adding but I'm not abandoning this project.

Credits
